title: Data Analyst

sections.full_text:
Data Analyst
HealthSync Inc. Toronto, ON

Responsibilities:
- Prepare and analyze healthcare operational datasets
- Build dashboards using Tableau and PowerBI
- Perform statistical analysis and A/B testing
- Work with SQL to extract and clean data
sections.skills:
- Python, SQL, Excel
- Tableau or PowerBI
- Pandas, NumPy

Preferred:

full_text_snippet:
Data Analyst 
HealthSync Inc. Toronto, ON

Responsibilities:
- Prepare and analyze healthcare operational datasets
- Build dashboards using Tableau and PowerBI
- Perform statistical analysis and A/B testing
- Work with SQL to extract and clean data

Required Skills:
- Python, SQL, Excel
- Tableau or PowerBI
- Pandas, NumPy

Preferred:
- Experience in healthcare analytics
- Knowledge of ETL processes
